institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 12 (Recruitment and Management of Job Seekers)
contents: Article 12 (Recruitment and management of job seekers) ① After recruiting job seekers through various channels, the Chairman of the Board considers the job seekers' employment ability and classifies them into those eligible for placement employment, those eligible for training employment, and those to improve their language skills, and registers them with World Job Plus. It can be managed. Revised September 11, 2020, ② The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall improve transparency by determining whether or not there are duplicate benefits when selecting and registering candidates for cost support mediation and training pursuant to Paragraph 1.
